text: 'That Was a Moment' The Goodwill's debut album. It was released on February 11, 2003. ==Track listing== #Let It Go – 3:00 #Sometimes the Radio – 3:45 #Lying Alone – 3:50 #The Boyscout – 3:42 #Brethren – 3:07 #Deception – 3:03 #That's What Sean Said – 3:16 #Doesn't Even Matter – 4:00 #Forgotten Feeling – 4:12 #Broken – 6:17 ==Personnel== *Brian Barbuto – vocals *Travis Johnides – guitars *Josh Moskoviz – bass *Greg Oechslin – drums *Dan Sanchez – guitars ==References== Category:2003 debut albums Category:The Goodwill albums Category:Negative Progression Records albums
title: That Was a Moment
